name: Earnings summarizer (local docs)
description: Summarize latest earnings using indexed local documents.
goal: Summarize the most recent earnings update and highlight deltas vs prior quarter.
instructions: Use local vault evidence first. Extract revenue, margin, guidance, and notable management commentary. Include direct evidence links.

name: Competitor scan (local + connectors)
description: Scan local notes/docs and connector snapshots for competitor updates.
goal: Identify competitor developments that may impact tracked companies.
instructions: Blend local evidence with connector snapshots. Group findings by competitor and include confidence labels.

name: Risk checklist
description: Run a repeatable downside and risk drift checklist.
goal: Surface top downside risks and flag what changed since last review.
instructions: Use a checklist format: business model, financial, governance, macro/regulatory, and thesis-break risks. Cite evidence for each item.
